footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: Deep healing, care, and transformation with ancestral medicines.
heroSubtitle1: We are a community dedicated to facilitating healing processes through the sacred use of ayahuasca, in a safe and respectful environment.
heroSubtitle2: Discover how this ancestral practice can open paths to self-knowledge and inner peace.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Join our next ceremonies and start your journey of transformation.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
registerSubtext: Join our community to begin your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: A verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to receive updates about our ceremonies and exclusive content for your healing journey.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral beverage from the Amazon, prepared by combining two plants: the ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the chacruna leaf (Psychotria viridis). This combination creates a powerful psychoactive brew that has been used for centuries by indigenous peoples for healing, spiritual connection, and self-knowledge.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew acts on the central nervous system, inducing an altered state of consciousness that allows for deep introspection, emotional release, and the resolution of internal conflicts. The experience, often guided by a spiritual master, is a journey into one's own being, where unconscious patterns and traumas can be understood and healed.
spiritualMasterDescription: Known as the 'mother of all plants,' Ayahuasca is considered a wise and loving spirit that teaches, corrects, and guides those who approach it with respect and a sincere desire for healing. It is a tool for connecting with the spiritual dimension and the wisdom of nature.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find a renewed sense of direction and clarity in their life purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the release of emotional blockages and can contribute to physical well-being.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It opens a deep connection with oneself, with others, and with the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: A shared experience where the collective energy enhances the individual healing process. Ideal for those seeking support and community connection.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized session, focused on your specific needs. Recommended for those who desire a deeper, more focused process.
guidesPageSubtitle: Experienced spiritual masters who will accompany you with respect and wisdom on your healing journey.
preparationProcessDescription: The weeks before are crucial. We begin with a special diet and a clear intention.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred night of introspection and connection guided by the medicine and the master.
experienceProcessDescription: Each journey is unique. We embrace visions, emotions, and teachings with an open heart.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we apply the lessons learned to our daily lives, transforming our reality.
dietTitle: The Dieta: Body and Spirit in Harmony
dietSubtitle: A fundamental part of the process is preparing your body. The 'dieta' helps purify and sensitize you for the experience.
allowedFoodsList: White meats (chicken, fish) boiled or grilled
prohibitedFoodsList: Spicy, fried, or heavily seasoned foods
mentalPrepSubtitle: The inner work is as important as the physical. We cultivate a state of receptivity and respect.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Clearly define what you want to heal or understand. Your intention will be your guide.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts and emotions. It is a powerful tool for self-awareness.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring to the surface deep emotions. It is an opportunity to face them with love and acceptance, knowing that you are in a safe and supportive environment. The medicine works by cleaning what no longer serves you, allowing you to release old wounds and move towards a fuller life.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare your sacred space with items that bring you comfort and peace.
preparationCtaTitle: Are you ready to begin your journey?
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is the first step to a transformative experience. Discover everything you need to know to come to the ceremony with a prepared body and an open heart.
contactCommunityText: Our community is a space for support and mutual growth. By following us, you will stay informed about our events, receive inspiring content, and be part of a network of people committed to their healing and spiritual awakening.
editCeremonyDescription: Modify the details of this ceremony.
addCeremonyDescription: Add a new ceremony to the list of upcoming events.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The ceremony will be permanently deleted.
addVideoDescription: Add a new video to the carousel.
videoFormUrlOrUpload: You must provide a video URL or upload a file.
deleteVideoConfirmDescription: This video will be permanently deleted from the carousel.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This guide will be permanently deleted.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage and view your application's structure.
